creator: ravn@unixsnedkeren.dk
text:
The SMTPAppender is very nice for the purpose of getting notified of severe
problems.  It would be nice if the various options for the SMTPAppender -
especially the subject field - could contain information from the logged events.

Notably it would be very relevant for me to have the triggering exception name
and message in the subject field.

My initial thought was to provide %'s in the same way that LayoutPattern does,
abeit with a differnet meaning.
This functionality can already be found version 1.3.
creator: ceki@apache.org
ravn@unixsnedkeren.dk
text:
(In reply to comment #1)
> This functionality can already be found version 1.3.

That sounds very nice.  My only problem with that is that 1.3 is in alpha, and I
need this for production code.

Would the 1.3 version run under 1.2.9?

creator: ceki@apache.org
text: Probably not because there have quite a few changes between log4j 1.2 and 1.3.
